parameters.name: ProgramConfig
parameters.description: The new configurations of the episodes that you want to modify or add. For more information, see the **ProgramConfig** section of this topic.

parameters.name: ProgramId
parameters.description: The ID of the episode list that you want to modify. It is included in the response when you call the [AddPlaylistItems](~~203414#doc-api-live-AddPlaylistItems~~ "Adds episodes to a production studio of the video carousel mode.") operation.

parameters.name: ProgramItems
parameters.description: The episodes that you want to modify or add. The value is a JSON string. For more information, see the **InputProgramItem** section of this topic.
